mapper.select: SELECT EV.EVENT_NUM, EV.EMP_NUM, EV.EMP_NAME, EV.EVENT_TITLE, EV.WRITE_DATE, EV.EVENT_HITS FROM ( SELECT EV.EVENT_NUM, EV.EMP_NUM, E.EMP_NAME, EV.EVENT_TITLE, TO_CHAR(EV.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE, EV.EVENT_HITS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY EV.EVENT_NUM DESC) AS RNUM FROM EVENT EV LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP E ON EV.EMP_NUM=E.EMP_NUM WHERE 1 = 1 ) EV WHERE EV.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCount} AND #{endCount}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM EVENT WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT(EVENT.EVENT_NUM, EVENT.EMP_NUM, EVENT.EVENT_TITLE, EVENT.EVENT_CONT) VALUES(EVENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{emp_num}, #{title}, #{cont})
mapper.select: SELECT CMNT_NUM, CLNT_NUM, EVENT_NUM, EMP.EMP_NUM, CMNT_CONT, DEL_CHECK, EMP.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_NAME FROM EVENT_CMNT, EMP WHERE EVENT_CMNT.EMP_NUM = EMP.EMP_NUM AND EVENT_NUM = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT_CMNT(CMNT_NUM, CLNT_NUM, EVENT_NUM, EMP_NUM, CMNT_CONT) VALUES(#{cmnt_num}, #{clnt_num}, #{no}, #{emp_num}, #{cmnt_cont})
